revised_title: Obituary of Robert Harley: A Pioneering Mathematician and Minister
tldr: This obituary highlights the life and achievements of Robert Harley, a mathematician, minister, and advocate for the temperance movement. Harley was a close friend of George Boole and made significant contributions to the fields of mathematics and astronomy. He also played a vital role in the development of education and was involved in various social and philanthropic activities.
